name: 我的赛车生涯/My Racing Career
description: This is a Simulation Management Game,lt's not a racing game, and the game has a large number of random factors, such as random opponent strength, random events, random equipment and so on ... And the player has only one life in the game, each failure can only start a new game, so every time the game players may have a different game...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10 Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10 Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX960 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
